dict.acceptation: 保险，保险业；保险费；预防措施；
[体]巩固球队领先局面，使对手不能因增加一分而成平局的；

sent.orig: Insurance is included in shipping fee for priority and express only.
sent.trans: Insurance是航运优先费，并表示只包括在内。

sent.orig: Insurance categories include: endowment insurance, occupational injury insurance, unemployment insurance, hospitalization insurance and maternity insurance.
sent.trans: 保险种类有养老，工伤，医疗，失业和生育保险。

sent.orig: Social insurance includes age insurance, unemployment insurance, medical insurance, work related injury insurance and maternity insurance.
sent.trans: 社会保险包括养老保险、失业保险、医疗保险、工伤保险和生育保险。

sent.orig: Provide on top Personal Insurance, Group Life Insurance, Medical Insurance, Credit Insurance, Accident Insurance.
sent.trans: 提供最领先的个人保险及团体寿险、医疗保险、信贷保险、意外保险、保险相关消息等。

sent.orig: Insurance agents, insurance brokers, insurance agencies assess public can join the insurance industry association.
sent.trans: 保险代理人、保险经纪人、保险公估机构可以加入保险行业协会。
